about_the_game:
【Demo Overview】

This demo features 5 chapters, focusing on the level experience. Other special features will be implemented in the full version, along with additional new elements.

【Story Summary】

At the critical moment of the battle with the Demon King, the time and space around Luo Wenhao and Lin Youyue suddenly distorted. The space rippled like waves, cracks appeared in the fabric of time and space, and in an instant, they were swallowed up and transported a thousand years back to the continent of Euscia.

Luo Wenhao and Lin Youyue found themselves in a peaceful border town of the Kingdom of Tinea. The inhabitants, unaware of their arrival, continued their tranquil and serene lives. Thus, these two individuals from the future began their new adventures in a past world.

The Demon King was transported to the fifth year after the establishment of the new nation by the Seven Saint Heroes. His arrival caused new upheavals. As the Demon King desired, he took control of one of the Seven Saints’ bodies and began his quest for a comeback!

At this moment, in a small mountain village, a young man set out from his home, about to change his destiny...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core级以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce FX5600级/ATI Radeon9600以上 (支持Shader 2.0以上的显卡)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 可互换声卡
  • Additional Notes: WINDOWS XP以下不能运行（含XP)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: i5处理器
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce FX5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: WINDOWS XP以下不能运行（含XP)

short_description: " Countermark2 Saga: Seven Sacred Heroes" is a 2D tactical strategy game and the sequel to "Countermark Saga Frozen sword." The game tells the adventurous story of a modern-day youth who travels through time. The demo version is only open for 5 chapters
